citations.narrative:
On August 31, 2025, the licensee acquired a 7 month old female serval named "Miranda. Servals are considered an
exotic/wild felid and requires authorization under the exhibitor license.
Licenses authorize a specific number of animals and specific types of animals. The current license does not authorize the
possession of Exotic/Wild Felids for regulated purposes. The licensee must obtain authorization for an exotic/wild felid to
conduct regulated activity with the serval under the licensing requirements of the Animal Welfare Act.
Correct by 01/31/2026
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
NOTE: No regulated activity should be conducted with the serval until exotic/wild felids and hybrids are authorized under
the license.
n

narrative:
2.1(b)(2)(ii) 
   
Requirements and application 
On August 31, 2025, the licensee acquired a 7 month old female serval named "Miranda. Servals are considered an 
exotic/wild felid and requires authorization under the exhibitor license.  
 
Licenses authorize a specific number of animals and specific types of animals. The current license does not authorize the 
possession of Exotic/Wild Felids for regulated purposes. The licensee must obtain authorization for an exotic/wild felid to 
conduct regulated activity with the serval under the licensing requirements of the Animal Welfare Act.  
 
Correct by 01/31/2026 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
NOTE: No regulated activity should be conducted with the serval until exotic/wild felids and hybrids are authorized under 
the license. 
 
 n
